tweets.text: @Timcast Sent, made sure it had a subject line too! https://t.co/nFCnQWCe8n
@EricBre54433336 not sure, I'll DM him again and see if the offer is still good
He then deleted all those tweets a few years later, which, again, kinda weird

He even kept it going in the DMs, apparently offering to fly me to Chicago to cover "gangland" which he helpfully explained to me. I DMed him a few more times to get him to actually make good on his offer but he never did. Anyway, what a weird dude. https://t.co/mPzRGhk8ac

once I accepted the flight to kabul, he pivoted, offering to fly me to Chicago- I would have preferred to go to ND for DAPL protests (then  on their 2nd day) but he said that wasn't "dangerous or scary" enough- though it did turn out to be one of the largest protests of 2016 https://t.co/NpitTvTNwG

so basically he left milwaukee cause he was scared they were chanting "fuck white people" and then he kept offering to fly me anywhere in the world- I would be an idiot to turn that down, so I accepted https://t.co/xwtFSwssaL
is it a good time to bring up the fact that tim pool owes me a flight to kabul, as he stated publicly in now-deleted tweets, no one talks about that enough
i am watching the david vs goliath season of survivor on netflix and it is so good

What if I, ya know, know exactly among my Facebook friends reads a lot and should be my friend on goodreads. How do I invite just them?
So wait, let me get this straight, the only possible way to invite people from Facebook to GoodReads is to invite a random, like, 15? Yucky.

Got 3 paragraphs of my 6-minute speech done... sleep. Waking up early to call Samara and work on this. Gotta give it 7 tomorrow. Agh.

Listening to some damn good jazz.
Mmm... delicious hot pizza....
Watching Heroes to hold off my TV wantage. Skins, The Wire... too far away.
I truly can't wait for The Wire in january... ( http://urltea.com/29g6 )
ebay shopping. I want that jacket that jamie had on the last 30 rock episode. I feel like a tool saying that, though.
Teaching Arlen about twitter.
Recorded a song; "Cold". Just messing around with the keyboard. You can check it on the myspace -> http://myspace.com/aturningmercury
Finally forced myself to listen to the new britney album after fresh air recommended it- Hot as Ice was at least worth it. I hate myself.
Heard a report on the radio about kids in the UK dying from using tanning salons too much, my first though: "I should try out tanning..."
Can't believe that my saturday's almost over already- gotta stop sleeping late so my weekend lasts longer.

After cleaning the iTunes library- 284 songs gone. A good portion of them DRM'd iTunes Store songs. Trying to get rid of the leash...
Cleansing the iTunes Library: starting at 3198 songs.
It's weird how twittering has kind of become a reflex.

commits.message: refactor: use @apply in on-this-day for cleaner classes

fix: reduce lint errors from 143 to 61

fix: manual 80-char line breaks for new components
chore: strict 80-char formatting + prettier config cleanup

docs: condense README to scannable feature reference
feat: support multiple reply-to URLs in IndieWeb reply posts

feat: minimal Twitter-style webmention display with moderation
